title: Lost and Found System for CSU
description: A comprehensive digital platform for managing lost and found items at Caraga State University, replacing manual processes with efficient digital tracking and enhanced visibility for students and staff.
subtitle: Modernizing Campus Lost and Found Services with Digital Solutions

backgroundImage.alt: Abstract academic background with geometric patterns

features.title: Enhanced Visibility
features.description: Campus-wide digital bulletin system that makes lost items searchable and visible to all students and staff, eliminating the need for physical visits to the guardhouse.

features.title: Digital Tracking System
features.description: Comprehensive item logging with timestamps, locations, and detailed descriptions replacing manual logbooks with efficient digital records.

features.title: Reduced Social Hesitation
features.description: Anonymous browsing capabilities and user-friendly interface that encourages students to check for their belongings without embarrassment.

features.title: Complete Traceability
features.description: Advanced analytics and reporting features for administrators to track patterns, generate statistics, and make informed policy decisions.

author: CSU Development Team
